item.description:
A Midsummer’s Walk! This event is in conjunction with the Hartford Heights Tall Club.

Too hot in July for real hikes, so we’ll have a pleasant walk along the Windsor Locks Canal. There is no loop to walk – we’ll walk out as far as we want and then come back on the same path. This paved path was formerly the towpath for a canal that took boats around the Enfield rapids. It’s a lovely walk with no hills involved! Meet in the parking lot at 3:00 PM. Lot is on Canal Road in Suffield, off from Route 159, just south of its intersection with Route 190.

Dinner or pizza after if people are interested.

Gloria (http://hiking.meetup....) is the leader on this one so please direct questions to her.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: Gloria's Walk Along the Windsor Locks Canal
